name: BlockyRoads
description:
A simple platformer where you are a ball that must get from the starting position, to the end. To do that you will have to move, jump, avoid things, and try not to fall. That is it, really. I was initially inspired by SkyRoads, a game I used to love and had been playing recently, but the game ended up diverging from that formula to some degree.

This game was created as my introduction to Unity, so it is simple, rough, and very short. If you have any problems with the game, let me know, and I will try to address them.
